title: Bank of America
text: This describes a partnerhsip of the SSG with the Bank of America.

title: Hello World!  We’re Software for Social Good
text:
placeholder image




Hello World!  We’re Software for Social Good
Here at VCU, students from multi-disciplinary backgrounds connect with outer communities through projects that create social benefit.

Learn more about us







Our Pillars

Experiment, learn, design and develop - We provide a sandbox for students to uncover their true potential.
Join our team







placeholder image




Hands-on Experience

Provide students with opportunities to work on real-world software challenges.






placeholder image




Innovative Solutions

Build innovative and creative softwares with a socially beneficial bottom line.






placeholder image




Talent Development

Discover emerging skills in the software design and development by working with us.
